graph.original_query: ### Generate a Beautiful Multi-Page Landing Website using Flowbite (Dark Mode)Create a **dark-themed, modern landing website** using **Flowbite + Tailwind CSS**.The site should have 4 pages:* `index.html` (Home)* `about.html`* `products.html`* `contact.html`‚úÖ **Site Requirements**#### üåå Theme* Use **Flowbite** with **Tailwind CSS** in **dark mode*** Ensure consistency in fonts, spacing, and responsiveness* Include dark background and high-contrast elements#### üìÑ Pages and Structure1. **index.html (Home)** * Full-screen hero section with background image (from Unsplash or other safe public image sources) * Features section (3‚Äì4 highlights) * Testimonials section (dark cards) * CTA section (‚ÄúStart Free Trial‚Äù or similar) * Footer with social icons + links2. **about.html** * Mission statement * Timeline or values section * Team member cards3. **products.html** * Grid layout with 6‚Äì8 product/service cards * Each card has title, short description, image, price (if relevant) * Filter or category tags optional4. **contact.html** * Contact form with name/email/message * Map placeholder or location card * Email and support links#### üñºÔ∏è Image Guidance* Use image URLs from: * [Unsplash](https://source.unsplash.com) * [Pexels](https://www.pexels.com/) * [Picsum](https://picsum.photos)Example:```html```#### üß© Tech Notes* Use Tailwind + Flowbite CDN setup (no build tools required)* Keep layout modular: shared header/footer across pages* Add `` tags and page titles properly* Ensure mobile responsiveness---### üì¶ Output FormatPlease generate 4 code blocks, one per file:```html...``````html...```...Use real, readable English content ‚Äì not placeholders.The goal is to make the site **look and feel like a real premium product launch site**. Call CoderAgent atleast 66-7 times for different exhaustive but specific tasks as this is a detailed project. Remember CoderAgent is stateless and can't see other outputs. So you will have to be very specific in creating only parts else it will create full htmls---

nodes.description: Initial Query
Create a dark-themed, modern landing website index.html (Home) - Hero Section
nodes.agent_prompt: Create the `index.html` file for the landing website. Focus on the hero section with a full-screen background image from Unsplash (using `https://source.unsplash.com/1600x900/?technology,dark`), a title, and a brief description. Use Flowbite with Tailwind CSS in dark mode. Ensure the section is responsive and visually appealing.

nodes.description: Create the Features section for index.html
nodes.agent_prompt: Create the Features section (3‚Äì4 highlights) for the `index.html` landing website. Each feature should include an icon, title, and short description.  Use Flowbite with Tailwind CSS in dark mode. Ensure the section is responsive and visually appealing.

nodes.description: Create the Testimonials section for index.html
nodes.agent_prompt: Create the Testimonials section (dark cards) for the `index.html` landing website.  Each testimonial should include a quote, author name, and designation.  Use Flowbite with Tailwind CSS in dark mode. Ensure the section is responsive and visually appealing.

nodes.description: Create the CTA section for index.html
nodes.agent_prompt: Create the CTA (Call to Action) section (‚ÄúStart Free Trial‚Äù or similar) for the `index.html` landing website.  Use Flowbite with Tailwind CSS in dark mode. Ensure the section is responsive and visually appealing.

nodes.description: Create the Footer section for index.html
nodes.agent_prompt: Create the Footer section (social icons + links) for the `index.html` landing website.  Use Flowbite with Tailwind CSS in dark mode. Ensure the section is responsive and visually appealing.

nodes.description: Combine all sections to create the complete index.html
nodes.agent_prompt: Combine all the sections: hero section from `index_hero_section_html_T001`, features section from `index_features_section_html_T002`, testimonials section from `index_testimonials_section_html_T003`, CTA section from `index_cta_section_html_T004`, and the footer section from `index_footer_section_html_T005` into a complete and valid `index.html` file.  Add necessary HTML structure, meta tags, and title. Use Flowbite with Tailwind CSS in dark mode and CDN setup. Ensure mobile responsiveness and consistency.

nodes.description: Create about.html - Mission Statement section
nodes.agent_prompt: Create the Mission Statement section for the `about.html` page. The section should display the company's mission statement in a visually appealing manner. Use Flowbite with Tailwind CSS in dark mode. Ensure responsiveness.

nodes.description: Create about.html - Timeline or Values Section
nodes.agent_prompt: Create the Timeline or Values section for the `about.html` page. Design a timeline showcasing important milestones or present core company values. Use Flowbite with Tailwind CSS in dark mode. Ensure responsiveness.

nodes.description: Create about.html - Team Member Cards
nodes.agent_prompt: Create the Team Member Cards section for the `about.html` page. Each team member card should include a photo, name, and designation. Use Flowbite with Tailwind CSS in dark mode. Ensure responsiveness.

nodes.description: Combine all sections to create the complete about.html
nodes.agent_prompt: Combine the mission statement section from `about_mission_statement_html_T007`, the timeline or values section from `about_timeline_values_html_T008`, and the team member cards section from `about_team_members_html_T009` into a complete and valid `about.html` file. Add necessary HTML structure, meta tags, and title. Use Flowbite with Tailwind CSS in dark mode and CDN setup. Ensure mobile responsiveness and consistency.

nodes.description: Create products.html - Product/Service Cards (Grid Layout)
nodes.agent_prompt: Create a grid layout with 6 product/service cards for the `products.html` page. Each card should have a title, short description, image, and price (if relevant). Use image URLs from Unsplash, Pexels, or Picsum. Use Flowbite with Tailwind CSS in dark mode. Ensure responsiveness.

nodes.description: Create products.html - Filter/Category Tags (Optional)
nodes.agent_prompt: Create Filter or Category Tags (optional) for the `products.html` page to allow filtering of the product cards. Use Flowbite with Tailwind CSS in dark mode. Ensure responsiveness.

nodes.description: Combine product cards and filters to create the complete products.html
nodes.agent_prompt: Combine the product grid layout from `products_grid_layout_html_T011` and optional filter/category tags from `products_filter_tags_html_T012` into a complete and valid `products.html` file. Add necessary HTML structure, meta tags, and title. Use Flowbite with Tailwind CSS in dark mode and CDN setup. Ensure mobile responsiveness and consistency.

nodes.description: Create contact.html - Contact Form
nodes.agent_prompt: Create a contact form with name, email, and message fields for the `contact.html` page. Use Flowbite with Tailwind CSS in dark mode. Ensure responsiveness.

nodes.description: Create contact.html - Map Placeholder or Location Card
nodes.agent_prompt: Create a map placeholder or location card for the `contact.html` page. This can be a static image or an embedded map. Use Flowbite with Tailwind CSS in dark mode. Ensure responsiveness.

nodes.description: Create contact.html - Email and Support Links
nodes.agent_prompt: Create Email and Support Links for the `contact.html` page. Use Flowbite with Tailwind CSS in dark mode. Ensure responsiveness.

nodes.description: Combine all sections to create the complete contact.html
nodes.agent_prompt: Combine the contact form from `contact_form_html_T014`, the map placeholder or location card from `contact_map_html_T015`, and the email and support links from `contact_email_support_html_T016` into a complete and valid `contact.html` file. Add necessary HTML structure, meta tags, and title. Use Flowbite with Tailwind CSS in dark mode and CDN setup. Ensure mobile responsiveness and consistency.

nodes.description: Distill index.html code
nodes.agent_prompt: Summarize the HTML code for `index_html_T006`, highlighting the key sections and their structure. Focus on the use of Flowbite and Tailwind CSS.

nodes.description: Distill about.html code
nodes.agent_prompt: Summarize the HTML code for `about_html_T010`, highlighting the key sections and their structure. Focus on the use of Flowbite and Tailwind CSS.

nodes.description: Distill products.html code
nodes.agent_prompt: Summarize the HTML code for `products_html_T013`, highlighting the key sections and their structure. Focus on the use of Flowbite and Tailwind CSS.

nodes.description: Distill contact.html code
nodes.agent_prompt: Summarize the HTML code for `contact_html_T017`, highlighting the key sections and their structure. Focus on the use of Flowbite and Tailwind CSS.
